page.title: Bombardier CEO Quits, Shares Plunge
page.text: MONTREAL (Reuters) - Paul Tellier stepped down as president and chief executive of Bombardier Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BBDsvb.TO target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BBDsvb.TO</A> <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BBDb.TO target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BBDb.TO</A>, sending the train and plane maker's shares down as much as 26 percent to a 10-year low on Monday.
